name: And Then The Ghosts Ate Them
name_original: And Then The Ghosts Ate Them
description:
Destroy the ghosts in each room to advance. Your gun holds a limited amount of charges and reloads slowly, so you need to run and jump to avoid the ghosts until you can shoot them.

Controls:

  • WASD or ARROW keys to move
  • SPACEBAR or E to shoot
